ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Polar (Charge and Mass Magnetospheric Ion Composition) CAMMICE 3-Min Key Parameters

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata
Added DOI and PublicationInfo minted by LFB, metadata versioned up to SPASE 2.6.0, reviewed by LFB 20230727

ResourceHeader.Description: Polar CAMMICE (Charge and Mass Magnetospheric Ion Composition) Key Parameters, H, He, O Count Rates

PublicationInfo.Authors: Fritz, Theodore, Allan; Niehof, Jonathan, Thomas

AccessURL.Name: FTPS from SPDF (not with most browsers)
HTTPS from SPDF
AccessURL.Description: In CDF via HTTP from CDAWeb

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb HAPI Server
AccessURL.Description: Web Service to this product using the HAPI interface.

Parameter.Name: Time
Parameter.Caveats: This is time when data collection started. Derived from Absolute Time Code of telemetry, corrected for lag between data collection and transmission.

Parameter.Name: Measurement start offset
Parameter.Description: Offset from Epoch to actual start of measurement
Parameter.Caveats: Difference between Epoch and start of measurement. Identically zero by definition of Epoch. Treat as a time difference in millisconds. NOT an uncertainty in timebase.

Parameter.Name: Measurement end offset
Parameter.Description: Offset from Epoch to end of measurement
Parameter.Caveats: Difference between Epoch and end of measurement. This is the length of time over which data are sampled/averaged. Treat as a time difference in millisconds. NOT an uncertainty in timebase.

Parameter.Name: Pitch angle
Parameter.Caveats: Gyrotropy is assumed and measurements are only made in spin plane of spacecraft. Fluxes may be averaged across several measurements with the same pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: Pitch angle bin width
Parameter.Description: Distance from center of PA bin to edge.
Parameter.Caveats: NOT uncertainty in PA, but binning of derived PA (which is assumed perfectly known, but actually approximately +/- 5 degrees because of finite sector size).

Parameter.Name: Energy
Parameter.Caveats: Really ESA potential, i.e. energy per charge (E/q) of incident particles.

Parameter.Name: Energy channel half-width
Parameter.Caveats: Really ESA potential, i.e. energy per charge (E/q) of incident particles. Based on delE/E of 0.1591.

Parameter.Name: Directional H+ flux
Parameter.Caveats: This is the "four parameter" H+ flux; for lower energies H0Flux may be better as it does not require a SSD signal.

Parameter.Name: H+ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Directional He+ flux
Parameter.Caveats: This is the "four parameter" He+ flux; for lower energies He0Flux may be better as it does not require a SSD signal.

Parameter.Name: He+ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Directional He++ flux
Parameter.Caveats: This is the "four parameter" He++ flux; for lower energies He0Flux may be better as it does not require a SSD signal.

Parameter.Name: He++ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Directional O+/++ flux
Parameter.Caveats: Low charge states (1,2), calibrated for O+. This is the "four parameter" O+/++ flux; for lower energies O0Flux may be better as it does not require a SSD signal.

Parameter.Name: O+/++ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Directional O3+ flux
Parameter.Caveats: Includes all high charge states (3+); calibrated for O3+.This is the "four parameter" O3+ flux; for lower energies O0Flux may be better as it does not require a SSD signal.

Parameter.Name: O3+ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Directional H+ flux (zero energy)
Parameter.Description: H+ flux by pitch angle with no energy signal
Parameter.Caveats: Only contains flux from ions which have a start/stop signal but no postacceleration energy measurement.

Parameter.Name: H0 flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Directional He flux (zero energy)
Parameter.Description: He flux by pitch angle with no energy signal
Parameter.Caveats: Only contains flux from ions which have a start/stop signal but no postacceleration energy measurement. All charge states, calibrated for He+.

Parameter.Name: He0 flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Directional O flux (zero energy)
Parameter.Description: O flux by pitch angle with no energy signal
Parameter.Caveats: Only contains flux from ions which have a start/stop signal but no postacceleration energy measurement. All charge states. Calibrated for O+.

Parameter.Name: O0 flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Total ion flux (DCR)
Parameter.Caveats: Contains all ions, but calibrated for H+. All ions with valid start and stop signals, regardless of valid energy measurement (Double Coincidence Rate). Binned by pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: Total ion flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Total ion flux (FSR)
Parameter.Caveats: Contains all ions, but calibrated for H+. All ions with valid start signals,regardless of valid energy measurement or stop signal. (Front Singles Rate). Binned by pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: Total ion flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: H+ flux
Parameter.Caveats: This is the "four parameter" H+ flux; for lower energies H0FluxSpin may be better as it does not require a SSD signal. Spin-integrated on board, not integrated over pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: H+ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: He+ flux
Parameter.Caveats: This is the "four parameter" He+ flux; for lower energies He0FluxSpin may be better as it does not require a SSD signal. Spin-integrated on board, not integrated over pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: He+ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: He++ flux
Parameter.Caveats: This is the "four parameter" He++ flux; for lower energies He0FluxSpin may be better as it does not require a SSD signal. Spin-integrated on board, not integrated over pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: He++ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: O+/++ flux
Parameter.Caveats: Low charge states (1,2), calibrated for O+. This is the "four parameter" O+/++ flux; for lower energies O0FluxSpin may be better as it does not require a SSD signal. Spin-integrated on board, not integrated over pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: O+/++ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: O3+ flux
Parameter.Caveats: Includes all high charge states (3+); calibrated for O3+.This is the "four parameter" O3+ flux; for lower energies O0FluxSpin may be better as it does not require a SSD signal. Spin-integrated on board, not integrated over pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: O3+ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: H+ flux (zero energy)
Parameter.Description: Spin-averaged H+ flux with no energy signal
Parameter.Caveats: Only contains flux from ions which have a start/stop signal but no postacceleration energy measurement. Spin-integrated on board, not integrated over pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: H0 flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: He flux (zero energy)
Parameter.Description: Spin-averaged He flux with no energy signal
Parameter.Caveats: Only contains flux from ions which have a start/stop signal but no postacceleration energy measurement. All charge states, calibrated for He+. Spin-integrated on board, not integrated over pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: He0 flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: O flux (zero energy)
Parameter.Description: Spin-averaged O flux with no energy signal
Parameter.Caveats: Only contains flux from ions which have a start/stop signal but no postacceleration energy measurement. All charge states. Calibrated for O+. Spin-integrated on board, not integrated over pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: O0 flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Directional H+ count rate
Parameter.Description: H+ count rate by pitch angle
Parameter.Caveats: This is the "four parameter" H+ flux; for lower energies H0Counts may be better as it does not require a SSD signal.

Parameter.Name: H+ count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Directional He+ count rate
Parameter.Description: He+ count rate by pitch angle
Parameter.Caveats: This is the "four parameter" He+ count rate; for lower energies He0Counts may be better as it does not require a SSD signal.

Parameter.Name: He+ count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Directional He++ count rate
Parameter.Description: He++ count rate by pitch angle
Parameter.Caveats: This is the "four parameter" He++ count rate; for lower energies He0Counts may be better as it does not require a SSD signal.

Parameter.Name: He++ count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Directional O+/++ count rate
Parameter.Description: O+/++ count rate by pitch angle
Parameter.Caveats: Low charge states (1,2). This is the "four parameter" O+/++ count rate; for lower energies O0Counts may be better as it does not require a SSD signal.

Parameter.Name: O+/++ count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Directional O3+ count rate
Parameter.Description: O3+ count rate by pitch angle
Parameter.Caveats: Includes all high charge states (3+).This is the "four parameter" O3+ count rate; for lower energies O0Counts may be better as it does not require a SSD signal.

Parameter.Name: O3+ count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Directional CN+/++ count rate
Parameter.Description: CN+/++ count rate by pitch angle
Parameter.Caveats: C or N (not CN molecule.) Low charge states (1,2).

Parameter.Name: CN+/++ count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Directional H+ count rate (zero energy)
Parameter.Description: H+ count rate by pitch angle with no energy signal
Parameter.Caveats: Only contains counts from ions which have a start/stop signal but no postacceleration energy measurement.

Parameter.Name: H+ count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Directional He count rate (zero energy)
Parameter.Description: He count rate by pitch angle with no energy signal
Parameter.Caveats: Only contains counts from ions which have a start/stop signal but no postacceleration energy measurement. All charge states.

Parameter.Name: H+ count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Directional O count rate (zero energy)
Parameter.Description: O count rate by pitch angle with no energy signal
Parameter.Caveats: Only contains counts from ions which have a start/stop signal but no postacceleration energy measurement. All charge states.

Parameter.Name: H+ count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Total ion count rate (DCR)
Parameter.Caveats: All ions with valid start and stop signals, regardless of valid energy measurement (Double Coincidence Rate). Binned by pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: Total ion count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Description: Directional total ion count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Total ion count rate (FSR)
Parameter.Caveats: Contains all ions, but calibrated for H+. All ions with valid start signals,regardless of valid energy measurement or stop signal. (Front Singles Rate). Binned by pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: Total ion count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Description: Directional total ion count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Directional CN3+ count rate
Parameter.Description: CN3+ count rate by pitch angle
Parameter.Caveats: C or N (not CN molecule.) High charge states (3+). Only available through 1997 March 4.

Parameter.Name: CN3+ count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Directional Ne-Si count rate
Parameter.Description: Ne-Si count rate by pitch angle
Parameter.Caveats: Ne through Si, all charge states. Only available through 1997 March 4.

Parameter.Name: Ne-Si count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Directional S-Ni count rate
Parameter.Description: S-Ni count rate by pitch angle
Parameter.Caveats: S through Ni, all charge states. Only available through 1997 March 4.

Parameter.Name: S-Ni count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: H+ count rate
Parameter.Caveats: This is the "four parameter" H+ count rate; for lower energies H0CountsSpin may be better as it does not require a SSD signal. Spin-integrated on board, not integrated over pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: H+ count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: He+ count rate
Parameter.Caveats: This is the "four parameter" He+ count rate; for lower energies He0CountsSpin may be better as it does not require a SSD signal. Spin-integrated on board, not integrated over pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: He+ count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: He++ count rate
Parameter.Caveats: This is the "four parameter" He++ count rate; for lower energies He0CountsSpin may be better as it does not require a SSD signal. Spin-integrated on board, not integrated over pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: He++ count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: O+/++ count rate
Parameter.Caveats: Low charge states (1,2), calibrated for O+. This is the "four parameter" O+/++ count rate; for lower energies O0CountsSpin may be better as it does not require a SSD signal. Spin-integrated on board, not integrated over pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: O+/++ count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: O3+ count rate
Parameter.Caveats: Includes all high charge states (3+); calibrated for O3+.This is the "four parameter" O3+ count rate; for lower energies O0CountsSpin may be better as it does not require a SSD signal. Spin-integrated on board, not integrated over pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: O3+ count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: CN+/++ count rate
Parameter.Caveats: C or N (not CN molecule.) Low charge states (1,2). Spin-integrated on board, not integrated over pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: CN+/++ count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: H+ count rate (zero energy)
Parameter.Description: Spin-averaged H+ count rate with no energy signal
Parameter.Caveats: Only contains count rate from ions which have a start/stop signal but no postacceleration energy measurement. Spin-integrated on board, not integrated over pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: H0 count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: He count rate (zero energy)
Parameter.Description: Spin-averaged He count rate with no energy signal
Parameter.Caveats: Only contains count rate from ions which have a start/stop signal but no postacceleration energy measurement. All charge states, calibrated for He+. Spin-integrated on board, not integrated over pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: He0 count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: O count rate (zero energy)
Parameter.Description: Spin-averaged O count rate with no energy signal
Parameter.Caveats: Only contains count rate from ions which have a start/stop signal but no postacceleration energy measurement. All charge states. Calibrated for O+. Spin-integrated on board, not integrated over pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: O0 count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Total ion count rate (DCR)
Parameter.Description: Spin-averaged total (double coincidence) ion count rate
Parameter.Caveats: Contains all ions, but calibrated for H+. All ions with valid start and stop signals, regardless of valid energy measurement (Double Coincidence Rate). Integrated over pitch angle during processing, not spin-averaged.

Parameter.Name: Total ion count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Description: Spin-averaged total ion count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Total ion count rate (FSR)
Parameter.Description: Spin-averaged total (front singles) ion count rate
Parameter.Caveats: Contains all ions, but calibrated for H+. All ions with valid start signals,regardless of valid energy measurement or stop signal. (Front Singles Rate). Integrated over pitch angle during processing, not spin-averaged.

Parameter.Name: Total ion count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Description: Spin-averaged total ion count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: CN3+ count rate
Parameter.Caveats: C or N (not CN molecule.) High charge states (3+). Spin-integrated on board, not integrated over pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: CN3+ count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Ne-Si count rate
Parameter.Caveats: Ne through Si, all charge states. Spin-integrated on board, not integrated over pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: Ne-Si count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: S-Ni count rate
Parameter.Caveats: S through Ni, all charge states. Spin-integrated on board, not integrated over pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: S-Ni count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: 3He+ count rate
Parameter.Caveats: Helium-3 single charged. Spin-integrated on board, not integrated over pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: 3He+ count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: H2+ count rate
Parameter.Caveats: H2 molecule single charged. Spin-integrated on board, not integrated over pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: H2+ count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Molecule count rate
Parameter.Caveats: NO N2 O2 CO2 molecule single charged. Spin-integrated on board, not integrated over pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: Molecule count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Other species count rate
Parameter.Caveats: All species not in another rate scaler. Spin-integrated on board, not integrated over pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: Others count rate uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Matrix scaler counts
Parameter.Caveats: Number of counts in each matrix scaler.

Parameter.Name: Matrix scaler count uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Combines uncertainty from RS compression and Poisson stats.

Parameter.Name: Mass
Parameter.Caveats: Atomic mass usually associated with a mass group (upper groups are Ne,S,Fe,Zn). Negative values used for "zero energy" groups.

Parameter.Name: M/Q
Parameter.Caveats: Value at center of m/q bin.First two bins are junk, TOF<1; last bin is TOF>=1022

Parameter.Name: Directional H+ flux
Parameter.Description: H+ combined flux by pitch angle
Parameter.Caveats: Combines HFlux and H0Flux to cover entire energy range. Chooses smallest uncertainty for each energy of HFlux, H0Flux, or their mean.

Parameter.Name: H+ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Directional He+ flux
Parameter.Description: He+ combined flux by pitch angle
Parameter.Caveats: Combines HepFlux and He0Flux to cover entire energy range. Chooses smallest uncertainty for each energy of HeFlux, He0Flux, or their mean. He0Flux only selected if +1 charge dominates.Calibrated for He+.

Parameter.Name: He+ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Directional He++ flux
Parameter.Description: He++ combined flux by pitch angle
Parameter.Caveats: Combines AlphaFlux and He0Flux to cover entire energy range. Chooses smallest uncertainty for each energy of AlphaFlux, He0Flux, or their mean. He0Flux only selected if +2 charge dominates.Calibrated for He+2.

Parameter.Name: He++ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Directional O+ flux
Parameter.Description: O+ combined flux by pitch angle
Parameter.Caveats: Combines OpFlux and O0Flux to cover entire energy range. Chooses smallest uncertainty for each energy of OFlux, O0Flux, or their mean. O0Flux only selected if +1 charge dominates.Calibrated for O+.

Parameter.Name: O+/++ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Directional O++ flux
Parameter.Description: O++ combined flux by pitch angle
Parameter.Caveats: Combines OpFlux and O0Flux to cover entire energy range. Chooses smallest uncertainty for each energy of OFlux, O0Flux, or their mean. O0Flux only selected if +2 charge dominates. Calibrated for O+2.

Parameter.Name: O++ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Directional O>=3+ flux
Parameter.Caveats: Includes all high charge states (3+); calibrated for dominant state.

Parameter.Name: O>=3+ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: H+ flux
Parameter.Caveats: Combines HFluxSpin and H0FluxSpin to cover entire energy range. Chooses smallest uncertainty for each energy of HFlux, H0Flux, or their mean.

Parameter.Name: H+ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: He+ flux
Parameter.Caveats: Combines HepFluxSpin and He0FluxSpin to cover entire energy range. Chooses smallest uncertainty for each energy of HeFlux, He0Flux, or their mean. He0FluxSpin only selected if +1 charge dominates.Calibrated for He+.

Parameter.Name: He+ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: He++ flux
Parameter.Caveats: Combines AlphaFluxSpin and He0FluxSpin to cover entire energy range. Chooses smallest uncertainty for each energy of AlphaFluxSpin, He0FluxSpin, or their mean. He0FluxSpin only selected if +2 charge dominates. Calibrated for He+2.

Parameter.Name: He++ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: O+ flux
Parameter.Caveats: Combines OpFluxSpin and O0FluxSpin to cover entire energy range. Chooses smallest uncertainty for each energy of OFlux, O0Flux, or their mean. O0FluxSpin only selected if +1 charge dominates.Calibrated for O+.

Parameter.Name: O+/++ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: O++ flux
Parameter.Caveats: Combines OpFluxSpin and O0FluxSpin to cover entire energy range. Chooses smallest uncertainty for each energy of OFlux, O0Flux, or their mean. O0FluxSpin only selected if +2 charge dominates. Calibrated for O+2.

Parameter.Name: O++ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: O>=3+ flux
Parameter.Caveats: Includes all high charge states (3+); calibrated for dominant state.

Parameter.Name: O>=3+ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: H+ flux
Parameter.Caveats: Averaged over pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: H+ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: He+ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: He++ flux
Parameter.Caveats: Averaged over pitch angle 75-105, weighted by sin(alpha).

Parameter.Name: He++ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: O+ flux
Parameter.Caveats: Averaged over pitch angle 75-105, weighted by sin(alpha).

Parameter.Name: O+/++ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: O++ flux
Parameter.Caveats: Averaged over pitch angle 75-105, weighted by sin(alpha).

Parameter.Name: O++ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: O>=3+ flux
Parameter.Caveats: Averaged over pitch angle 75-105, weighted by sin(alpha).

Parameter.Name: O>=3+ flux uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: Based on a combination of rate scaler compression and Poisson statistics. One sigma.

Parameter.Name: Charge
Parameter.Caveats: Dominant charge state in He0 rate scaler. Mode (most common) charge state for the ENTIRE period (i.e. summed over all energies), low (below 30keV) energy, based on COUNTS. Because of different efficiencies, this may NOT be the charge state with the highest flux. Be particularly suspicious if this varies significantly from the mean charge state.

Parameter.Name: Charge
Parameter.Caveats: Dominant charge state in He0 rate scaler. Mode (most common) charge state for the ENTIRE period (i.e. summed over all energies), high (above 30keV) energy, based on COUNTS. Because of different efficiencies, this may NOT be the charge state with the highest flux. Be particularly suspicious if this varies significantly from the mean charge state.

Parameter.Name: avg charge
Parameter.Caveats: Mean charge state in He0 rate scaler. For the ENTIRE period (i.e. summed over all energies), low (below 30keV) energy, based on COUNTS.

Parameter.Name: avg charge
Parameter.Caveats: Mean charge state in He0 rate scaler. For the ENTIRE period (i.e. summed over all energies), high (above 30keV) energy, based on COUNTS.
